Inheritor of the sacred sword Tyrfing.
A savior in his time, but dislikes battle.
Julia's half brother. Appears in Fire

deeply for his sister. His confidence has
sometimes put him in danger. Appears in
Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

Princess of Renais. Ephraim's twin. Cares
dearly for her brother. Her kindness has
sometimes put her in danger. Appears in
Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

Inheritor of the Book of Naga. Seliph's
half sister by a different father. Gentle, yet
faces her destiny with strength. Appears in
Fire Emblem: Genealogy of the Holy War.

An emotionless member of the Black Fang
assassins. Known as the Angel of Death.

A brave but kind young warrior, raised by the

This helmet from Hector was forged in

helmet contrasts with its battle marks
to paint a vivid picture of its history.

very solid but surprisingly light.

The Restoration King's many victories
are recounted in the dents and dings
that adorn this helmet.

favored during the age of priestesses.

testament to how treasured it was.

A shining example of the mage knights of
